title: Professional Website Development
description: Get a website that actually works for your business. Fast, mobile-friendly, and built to bring in customers.

hero.headline: A Website That Actually Works
hero.subheadline: Stop losing customers to competitors with better websites. Get a professional site that showcases your business and brings in leads 24/7.

features.title: Mobile-First Design
features.description: Looks perfect on phones, tablets, and desktops. Your customers can find you anywhere.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: No more slow loading times. Your site loads in under 2 seconds, keeping visitors engaged.

features.title: Built for Google
features.description: SEO-optimized from day one. Get found when locals search for your services.

features.title: Easy to Update
features.description: Simple content management system. Update text and images without calling a developer.

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We discuss your business goals, target customers, and what you need your website to do.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: I create your custom website, incorporating your feedback along the way.

process.title: Launch & Training
process.description: Your site goes live and I show you how to make updates yourself.

faq.question: Do I need to provide content?
faq.answer: I'll help you with everything. If you have existing content, great! If not, I'll write compelling copy based on our discussions about your business.

faq.question: Can I update it myself?
faq.answer: Absolutely! I'll set up an easy content management system and show you how to use it. Most clients master it in 30 minutes.

faq.question: What about hosting?
faq.answer: Your site will be hosted on enterprise-grade servers with 99.9% uptime. Hosting is free - you just pay for your domain name (about $15/year).
